name: Enforcement
text: §147-73  Enforcement.  The department of agriculture is empowered through its authorized agents, deputies and inspectors to enforce this part and to have supervision and control of all enforcement officers of this part in the State. [L 1931, c 70, §3; RL 1935, §1075; am L 1939, c 92, §1; RL 1945, §1306; RL 1955, §22-72; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §22; am L 1961, c 132, §2; HRS §147-73]
